dct_description_sm: California on second Sanson model and labeled California Ins. Title without cartouche at map center top. Engraved by: [Gabriel Bodenehr].
Issued in his: Kurtz-bündige Abbildund Vorstellung der Gantzen Welt. -- Ulm: Georg Wilhelm Kühnen, 1692.
Pagination above map: "VII". No text below map.
[1702], pagination above map: "VII.c". No text below map.
With text below map: Neu=Mexico halt in sich: ..., and pagination above map "VII.c"
With text below map: NOVA MEXICO ..., and pagination above map: VII. 1 map : 6.4 x 7.8 cm. including border; on sheet 16.2 x 9.1 cm.
With text below map: Neu Mexico. ..., and pagination above map "VII".
